channel.title: Inspecting-pipelines on Martian
channel.description: Recent content in Inspecting-pipelines on Martian

item.title: Inspecting Pipelines
item.description: Pipestance Layout mrp All pipestance state generated by mrp are stored in the filesystem. There is no separate database or database client required. mrp creates a folder structure that is designed to be easy for humans to navigate. All you need are cd, ls, and cat, and all metadata files are pretty-printed JSON or plaintext in the case of STDOUT and STDERR logs. [ WIP - pipestance -> stages -> forks -> chunks ]
